derivation: from G575 (ἀποστοματίζω) and a (presumed) derivative of G4750 (ἀποστοματίζω);
strongs_def: to speak off-hand (properly, dictate), i.e. to catechize (in an invidious manner)
outline:
1. to recite from memory
    1. to repeat to a pupil (anything) for him to commit to memory
  2. to ply with questions, to catechise, and so to entice to answers
